                               java.util.Date eventEnd,

        Parameters:
        eventStart - the event start date
        eventEnd - the event end date
        timeStart - the time slot start
        Returns:
        true if the event intersect with the time slot

      • participantsStatus

        public java.util.HashMap<Participant,java.lang.String> participantsStatus(java.util.ArrayList<Participant> participants,
                                                                          java.util.Date timeStart)
        Being given a list of participants and a time slot of 15min, determines the status of the participants by using the method participantStatus
        Parameters:
        participants - the list of participant
        timeStart - the start date of the time slot
        Returns:
        An HashMap with participants and their status for the time slot

      • participantStatus

        public java.lang.String participantStatus(Participant participant,
                                          java.util.Date timeStart)
        Being given a participant and a time slot of 15min, determine the status of the participant. "available" if he does not have event in the time slot "unavailable" if he has mandatory event in the time slot "potentially" if he has event that he can cancel.
        Parameters:
        participant - the participant to test
        timeStart - the start date of the time slot
        Returns:
        A String that represent the participant's status (see above)

        Returns:
        true if the date is correct
